review: I love my Fire TV Stick!  How did I ever get along without it?
author: Cherry Creekmore

review: Most of the channels you need a current cable service. I like Roku much better...I cancelled cable cause of the high cost increase...very disappointed
author: Anna Tannehill

review: Worked for about an hour. Made a loud click and hasn't worked since. Working on a return as we speak.
author: Timothy S.

review: When it works, it is fantastic.  But many people, inlcuding myself, have had it suddenly stop working.  Everything seems okay when you are selecting a movie, but when it loads up, there is only audio, no video.
author: ruhamah

review: You have to pay for everything
author: Maximo

review: I love my new Amazon fire stick. I've watched movies, tv shows. It's great.
author: M. Dunn

review: Great item, more than I expected!
author: Victoria Sanchez

review: I was expecting more current free movies.Can it be used with my iPhone?
author: Daniel Marranzino

review: I am not a techie but the most difficult part of installing the stick was getting the cover off the remote to put in the batteries.  It isn't perfect but it is pretty close and at a reasonable price.  Love it!
author: Toni W.
